titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment on the grounds of the Edward Hines, Jr., Department of Veterans Affairs Hospital, Hines, Illinois, of a facility to provide temporary accommodations for family members of severely ill children being treated at a nearby university medical center.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4027)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1626 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 3/30/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to enter into an agreement to permit the Caring Place of Loyola, Inc., an Illinois nonprofit organization, to establish on the grounds of the Edward Hines, Jr., Department of Veterans Affairs Hospital in Hines, Illinois, a facility for providing temporary accommodations for family members of severely ill children being treated at the Loyola University of Chicago Medical Center.
